original_text: Ruth went down on her knees with her head towards the ground in front of Boaz. She said, ‘I am a foreign woman. So why do you choose to be so kind to me? Why are you taking care of me?’
korean_text: 룻이 엎드려 얼굴을 땅에 대고 절하며 그에게 이르되 나는 이방 여인이거늘 당신이 어찌하여 내게 은혜를 베푸시며 나를 돌보시나이까 하니

sentences.original_text: Ruth went down on her knees
with her head towards the ground
So why do you choose to be so kind to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왜 저에게 그렇게 친절하기로 선택하십니까

sentences.original_text: Why are you taking care of me
